sub_title: Data analyst working on insights and market research for Amsterdam and the surrounding Metropolitan Area. Focusing not only on visitors, but also on (international) businesses and residents.

profile_positions.description:
The Research & Insights Knowledge Group coordinates all research activities within the CityDNA network and collaborates with a wide range of CityDNA partners to bring new insights and opportunities to the wider membership. Members of this group use their expertise to discuss trends, share best practices, commission new research, and prepare and release reports that benefit the membership and reputation of the CityDNA network.

Examples of reports and projects we work on as a group are: CityDNA Benchmarking Report, CityDNA meetings Statistics report, City Tourism Monitor, Digital KPI Survey, Tourmis workshop & international seminar and also the reports in collaboration with our partners.
The work as chairperson, together with the vice-chairperson, involves organizing and structuring the work of approximately 20-25 talented analysts from the European continent. In addition, you are the link between the group and the other 7 Knowledge Groups and the CityDNA Board because you are a member of the Coordination Group and the Strategic Forum.
profile_positions.title: Chairperson Research & Insights Knowledge Group

profile_positions.description:
The Research & Statistics Knowledge Group co-ordinates all research activities within the ECM network, collaborating with a wide range of ECM partners to bring fresh insight and opportunities to the wider membership. Members of the group use their expertise to discuss trends, share best practice, commission new research, prepare and release reports that benefit the membership and reputation of the ECM network.

Examples of reports and projects that we work on as a group are: ECM Benchmarking Report, ECM meetings Statistics report, City Tourism Monitor, Digital KPI Survey, Tourmis workshop & international seminar aswell as the reports in collaboration with our partners.
The work as vice-chair includes, together with the chair person, organizing and structuring the work of 25 talented analysts from the European continent. You are also the link between the group and the other 7 Knowledge Groups and the Board.
profile_positions.title: Vice-chairperson Research & Statistics Knowledge Group

profile_positions.description:
Market research for Amsterdam and the surrounding Metropolitan Area that focuses not only on visitors, but also on (international) companies and residents.

This by making use of various information sources and research methods. Bringing the right information to the right person. As a result, we not only work internally for all departments, but also externally for partners and customers.
In addition, active in the research groups of the various networks that amsterdam&partners is part of, such as Kennisnetwerk Destinatie Nederland, National Data Alliance of the Netherlands and European Cities Marketing.
profile_positions.title: Research and Market Intelligence

profile_positions.description:
Responsible project leader and project owner for Visitor Insight. This is an online measuring instrument that provides an overview of the current visits in a city, a region or a province in a simple, accessible way by comparing visitor figures from different data sources. At the moment this tool is used by 5 destinations in Europe.
Part of the work is to develop the tool, supervise the accounts and set up and conduct training courses for new accounts.
profile_positions.title: Project leader & project owner of Visitor Insight

profile_positions.description: Support of various projects in the marketing department. These include support among other things the launch of the electronic Amsterdam Pass.
profile_positions.title: Marketing employee

profile_positions.description: As deputy office manager of one of the TIC's of the VVV Amsterdam (Amsterdam Tourism & Convention Board) I was responsible for the daily management of the office, making of work schedules, checking the cashregisters, supporting the staff and conducting interviews and helping at the desk with welcoming visitors / tourists.
profile_positions.title: Deputy Office Manager
